name: New Body Bar
description: Our body bar are full of botanicals like Vanilla, Lavender, Chamomile, or Green tea's. Feel like your at the Tropes with these wonderful  fragrances, Island Coconut, Hawaiian Islands, or Ocean Breeze.  The smell alone will create an oasis in your bathroom. Olive Oil, Shea butter, Lavender, Tea tree oil are some of the essential oils we use in our products. Try my favorite Mandarin Orange Patchouli,. You'll fall in love with this spice fragrance, that will make you come back for more. Our body bars are very lathery, and sweetly fragrant. Handmade, and not abrasive. 3.5 oz

name: Votive Candle
description: Let  Ollie & Alice created and atmosphere, Relax, light your candle. Now, rub it in slowly while your skin drink up the essential oils, and botanical and other ingredients that will give your skin that refreshing feeling. Now, don't that feel like you deserve it. Treat yourself good take care of your skin.

name: Step 2. Moisture Cleansing Pads
description: Get notice with radiant looking skin. Ollie & Alice cleansing pads are made with natural ingredients. It's vegan friendly and custom formula contains Salicylic Acid, Aloe Vera juice, Aloe vera gel, witch hazel, and other ingredients. Phthalates free, No Paraben, Impression Hydration Complex. Each pad will unclog your pores and inhibit the growth of bacteria and help shed dead skin cells that will promote softer skin. Ten pads.  4oz

name: Step 3. The Last Moisturizer you use on Earth
description: For more even skin tone, and softer looking skin, this is your defining moment. O & A Moisturizer with Green tea extracts, salicylic acid, and humectants will hydrate and attract moisture to your skin.  You will glow with radiance.  It's vegan friendly, No Paraben, and Phthalates free. This is step 3 in a three steps process. For Normal to Oily Skin all in one bottle.  Just use a small amount and spread evenly over your cleansed face and notice the difference in a short time . You can also use for a night cream.  8oz
